thread.title: Griezmann to representatives: This is not the reason I want to join Man United
thread.title_full: Griezmann to representatives: This is not the reason I want to join Man United

title: Griezmann to representatives: This is not the reason I want to join Man United
text: Griezmann to representatives: This is not the reason I want to join Man United ANTOINE GRIEZMANN will not move to Manchester United just to land a bumper contract, according to reports. PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 04:00, Fri, Feb 10, 2017 Express Sport understands Atletico Madrid’s striker is at the top of Jose Mourinho ’s summer wishlist. And United are ready to spend big in order to land the France international. They will have to meet Griezmann’s £86million buy-out clause at the Vicente Calderon, and are apparently willing to do so. Reports in France have even claimed personal terms have already been agreed in principle. GETTY Antoine Griezmann has won one major trophy so far at Atletico Madrid The 25-year-old is not simply motivated by the potential contract in Manchester According to The Sun , United have a deal worth £300,000 a week prepared to bring Griezmann to Old Trafford - but that alone will not be enough. The 25-year-old is not simply motivated by the potential contract in Manchester, as Champions League football is his key agenda. Griezmann wants to be playing at the highest level and is said to have made clear to his representatives moving to United is not about the money - it’s about achieving success. GETTY Antoine Griezmann will only move to Old Trafford if Manchester United have Champions League football How Man United could look with Antoine Griezmann Wed, February 1, 2017
